name: Farm Europe
goal:
Farm Europe is a think tank that aims to stimulate thinking on rural economies in the European Union. The think tank focuses on all policy areas that impact on rural business with a strong emphasis on agriculture and food policies, particularly the Common Agricultural Policy (CAP), but also food standards, the food chain, environment, energy and trade issues.

Farm Europe is an independent, creative and engaged voice contributing to the debate via the research of its own team, its publications and events, and the work of its members and partners.

The think tank itself has no political orientations. Our goal is to stimulate thinking with all partners and members. The think tank has its own multicultural team of recognised senior experts.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Farm Europe develops its own analysis and innovative solutions and offers its partners and members a platform to confront their views. We promote an ambitious, sustainable and coherent vision of rural economies.
The think tank focuses on all policy areas that impact on rural business, with a strong emphasis on agriculture and food policies, and especially the Common Agricultural Policy which is the main public lever to act at the European level.

OUR MAIN POLICY AREAS ARE :
Agriculture ;
Food ;
Environment ;
Energy ;
And trade

Farm Europe introduces into the debate spearhead proposals for decision-makers, with the objective of offering solutions, identifying necessary breaches of tradition and indicating pathways to build efficient policies in order to unleash the potential of rural economies.
